chunk.text: Influenza and respiratory syncytial virus screening for the detection of asymptomatically infected patients in hematology and oncology Ein Influenza und Respiratory Syncytial Virus Screening-Programm zur Detektion asymptomatisch infizierter hÃ¤matologisch-onkologischer Patienten
Introduction: Respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) and influenza virus infections are a significant healthcare risk for immunocompromised patients.
